caller_intent: Carlos wants to add his Kawasaki Z400 motorcycle to his existing insurance policy and obtain a quote for full coverage, aiming to consolidate payments into one bill.
resolution_steps: Agent confirmed Carlos's identity and motorcycle details (model, VIN, purchase date).
Collected address, driving experience, license information, and motorcycle usage (pleasure-only).
Discussed coverage options (full coverage, deductibles, towing/labor, roadside assistance).
Provided a quote from Progressive: $2,210/year for liability, $1,041/year for comprehensive, $2,022/year for collision, plus $8/year for towing and $10/year for roadside assistance.
Explained payment options (full payment vs. monthly installments with a 15% down payment).
Noted that collision coverage is the most expensive component and explained financing implications.
knowledge_required: Impact of financing on insurance quotes.
summary: Carlos sought to add his motorcycle to his existing policy. The agent gathered detailed information about the motorcycle, his driving history, and coverage preferences. A quote from Progressive was provided, highlighting the costs of liability, comprehensive, and collision coverage. Carlos opted to compare quotes but thanked the agent for the assistance.
